name: Speedy Flapp
description:
A unique twist on flappy bird in terms of much more speediness, for those who love a speedy challenge, this game is just a Demo though, it may or may not be pushed further (By adding more variety in terms of gameplay and etc), your feedback  and suggestion is very useful has impact, highly recommended that you do suggest and or criticize as you find necessary.
  • Press Space Or W Or UpKey Or Click Mouse  Or Touch SCreen To "Flapp" And Restart.
